## Node.Traversal.flattened property

When `true`<!-- -->, traverse the flattened element tree rooted at the node.

[https://drafts.csswg.org/css-scoping/\#flat-tree](https://drafts.csswg.org/css-scoping/#flat-tree)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly flattened?: boolean;
```
